lines.text: My head hurts, my teeth itch, my feet stink and I don't love Jesus.
You can't shoot me. I am the Savior returned to Earth, The Messiah, come to lead the people to righteousness. I am Jesus Christ.
Don't you ever touch the sacrificial fluids... okey dokey?
You dirty little son of a bitch! I'm gonna do some nasty things to you.

[holding up a dead rat he just stabbed with his bayonet]
This sucker's confirmed! Payback's a motherfucker!
You must taste blood to be a man!
